entry.def: If you have sinusitis, the layer of flesh inside your sinuses is swollen and painful, which can cause headaches and a blocked nose.

example.ex: I have had antibiotics for my sinusitis but it doesn't seem to be clearing up.
example.tran: 我服用了抗生素来治疗鼻窦炎，但似乎未能根治。

means.word_mean: 1. inflammation of one of the paranasal sinuses
